pr_title: Update urls to use https instead of http

timeline.message: Replace http urls with https for android/javaSE

timeline.bodyText: I see this is done in the icon caching PR so there is no need to make this change here
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: Merged develop in and took the changes from the lockscreen caching
replies.author: RHenigan

timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: the only changes in this file were the comments done by intellij so I checked out the file from develop
replies.author: RHenigan

timeline.bodyText: Some getUrl() calls in LifecycleManager.java are missed like the ones from lines (446 > 466). These ones should be updated as well.
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: added these and looking through to make sure others are not missed
replies.author: RHenigan

timeline.bodyText: Can we store the updated url in a var and pass that var instead of doing the replacement multiple times?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyText: It is not necessary to update that one
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
